about_the_game: The Last Life - is  game in which the main character has to fight with a furious and something terrible creature. Dip into another creepy adventure with a "slender" evil!
detailed_description: The Last Life - is  game in which the main character has to fight with a furious and something terrible creature. Dip into another creepy adventure with a "slender" evil!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4170 or AMD FX-6100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 1GB or AMD HD 6700 1GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 22.10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 4170 or AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti 2GB or AMD RX 550 2GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3210M
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 650M 1GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-3615QM
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 650M 1GB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
